FuncDef: Displays monitor command output of traffic statistics for Cross Connect Aggregation Groups (CCAGs) ports.
CLIs: ccag <ccag-id> [ path <path-id> ] [ type <type> ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the CCAG instance to monitor. Values-1 to 8.

Specifies the CCA path nodal context where the CCA path bandwidth, buffer and accounting parameters are maintained. The path context must be specified with either the a or b keyword specifying the CCA path context to be entered. Values-a, b.
Specifies cross connect type. Values-sap-sap, sap-net, net-sap.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
